data.name: Vanilla Dark 2 VK Fix/Mod PART 1 of 2
data.description:
стиль РАЗРЕЗАН НА 2 ЧАСТИ. для нормального функционирования нужны обе / this style is CUT INTO 2 PARTS, you need both parts so it'd function properly. the second part
Vanilla Dark 2 VK Fix/Mod PART 2 of 2
здесь / is here:
https://userstyles.org/styles/165927/

ЭТА ТЕМА - ДОПОЛНЕНИЕ/ИСПРАВЛЕНИЯ ДЛЯ VANILLA DARK 2, НЕ ОТДЕЛЬНЫЙ СТИЛЬ.
НЕ ЗАБЫВАЕМ СНАЧАЛА УСТАНАВЛИВАТЬ https://userstyles.org/styles/126419/vanilla-dark-2 
После обновления Vanilla Dark 2 этот фикс-мод возможно нужно будет переключить (ВЫКЛ/ВКЛ), чтобы он нормально работал.
Паблос в ВКшечке: https://vk.com/worstmod

This Fix/Mod IS NOT A STANDALONE THEME.
Make sure to install Vanilla Dark 2 first https://userstyles.org/styles/126419/vanilla-dark-2
This Fix/Mod may need to be switched (OFF/ON) after Vanilla Dark 2 update to function properly.
Check https://vk.com/worstmod if you have any questions/suggestions.

data.name: Deezer DarkCube
data.description: It's my dark reskin of the deezer.com website for users who like inverted colors that are easier on your eyes. You'll still have to select "Dark Theme" in settings on Deezer.com (click on your profile picture) to make this theme look as intended. This style since beginning uses experimetal css feature "backdrop-filter" to graphically visualise the seek (played/remaining time) bar position with special overlay on the picture thumbnail of currently playing title. This feature works for the time being properly only in Edge and Safari, in Chrome you have to set the "Enable Experimental Web Platform Features" flag in chrome://flags, in Opera set the "Enable Experimental Web Platform Features" preference, IE and Firefox are not supported yet..

data.description:
A simple Dark theme for the AWS Console and AWS Docs.

Your eyes are finally safe.

Be sure that auto-updates are enabled as this is frequently updated to keep up with changes in the console.  Also please feel free to contribute additions in the comments.
